# AI-Driven Commercial Claims Intake & Triage Platform

Production-grade insurance middleware demonstrating responsible AI integration in regulated environments.

### Key Features
âœ… End-to-end claims intake and triage  
âœ… AI-assisted extraction with mandatory human verification  
âœ… Explainable risk assessment (rules + AI observations)  
âœ… Deterministic routing to processing queues  
âœ… Full audit trail and regulatory compliance  
âœ… Cloud-native Azure infrastructure (IaC)  

### Technology Stack
- **.NET 10** - Modern C# with Clean Architecture
- **Azure OpenAI (GPT-4)** - Document extraction and risk observations
- **Azure SQL Database** - Transactional data with audit logs
- **Azure Blob Storage** - Document storage with lifecycle policies
- **Azure Container Apps** - Serverless container hosting
- **Bicep** - Infrastructure as Code

### AI Integration Points
1. **Document Extraction** - Extract structured data from unstructured documents
2. **Risk Observations** - Qualitative risk analysis (advisory only)

**Key Principle**: AI assists, humans decide, system proves it.
